{{Infobox sports league |title=FederaciÃ³n EspaÃ±ola de Baloncesto |current_season= |logo= Spanish Basketball Federation logo.jpg |pixels=150px |caption= |sport=[[Basketball]] |founded=1923 |folded= |fame= |motto = |teams= |continent= |country={{flagicon|Spain}} [[Spain]] |champion = |website=[http://www.feb.es/ feb.es] |ceo =JosÃ© Luis SÃ¡ez |TV= }}
The '''Spanish Basketball Federation''' ([[Spanish language|Spanish]]: ''FederaciÃ³n EspaÃ±ola de Baloncesto'', '''FEB''') is the national governing body of [[basketball]] in [[Spain]].
The Spanish Basketball Federation is a member of the continental association [[FIBA Europe]] and the global [[International Basketball Federation]] ('''FIBA''').
The organisation is responsible for the [[Spanish national basketball team]] (men's), [[Spain women's national basketball team|women's]] and [[Spain national youth basketball teams|youth]] national basketball teams.
==Honours== ===National Team=== * '''[[FIBA World Championship]]''' :* '''Winner (1):''' [[2006 FIBA World Championship|2006]] * '''[[Basketball at the Summer Olympics|Olympics]]''' :* Silver Medal (2): [[Basketball at the 1984 Summer Olympics|1984]], [[Basketball at the 2008 Summer Olympics|2008]] * '''[[EuroBasket]]''' :* '''Winner (2):''' [[EuroBasket 2009|2009]], [[EuroBasket 2011|2011]] :* Runner-up (6): [[EuroBasket 1935|1935]], [[EuroBasket 1973|1973]], [[EuroBasket 1983|1983]], [[EuroBasket 1999|1999]], [[EuroBasket 2003|2003]], [[EuroBasket 2007|2007]] :* Third place (2): [[EuroBasket 1991|1991]], [[EuroBasket 2001|2001]]
===National Team (women)=== * '''[[FIBA World Championship for Women|FIBA World Championship]] :* Third place (1): [[2010 FIBA World Championship for Women|2010]] * '''[[EuroBasket Women|EuroBasket]]''' :* '''Winner (1):''' 1993 :* Runner-up (1): [[EuroBasket Women 2007|2007]] :* Third place (4): [[EuroBasket 2001 Women|2001]], [[EuroBasket 2003 Women|2003]], [[EuroBasket Women 2005|2005]], [[EuroBasket Women 2009|2009]]
===National youth teams=== ====Men==== * '''[[FIBA U-19 World Championship]]''' :* '''Winner (1):''' 1999 :* Third place (1): 1995 * '''[[FIBA U-17 World Championship]]''' :* ''The event started in July 2010 and is held bi-annually.'' * '''[[FIBA Europe U-20 Championship]]''' :* '''Winner (1):''' [[2011 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|2011]] :* Runner-up (3): [[1996 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|1996]], [[2002 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|2002]], [[2007 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|2007]] :* Third place (5): [[1994 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|1994]], [[2000 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|2000]], [[2008 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|2008]], [[FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship 2009|2009]], [[2010 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|2010]] * '''[[FIBA Europe U-18 Championship]]''' :* '''Winner (3):''' 1998, 2004, [[2011 FIBA Europe Under-18 Championship|2011]] :* Runner-up (2): 1974, 1978 :* Third place (4): 1976, 1990, 1994, 2006 * '''[[FIBA Europe U-16 Championship]]''' :* '''Winner (2):''' [[2006 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|2006]], [[2009 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|2009]] :* Runner-up (6): [[1973 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1973]], [[1983 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1983]], [[1985 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1985]], [[1993 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1993]], [[1995 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1995]], [[2007 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|2007]] :* Third place (5): [[1979 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1979]], [[1991 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1991]], [[2001 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|2001]], [[2005 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|2005]], [[2011 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|2011]]
====Women==== * '''[[FIBA U-19 World Championship for Women]]''' :* Runner-up (2): [[2009 FIBA Under-19 World Championship for Women|2009]], [[2011 FIBA Under-19 World Championship for Women|2011]] * '''[[FIBA U-17 World Championship for Women]]''' :* ''The event started in July 2010 and is held bi-annually.'' * '''[[FIBA Europe U-20 Championship for Women]]''' :* '''Winner (2):''' 2007, [[2011 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship for Women|2011]] :* Runner-up (2): 2009, [[2010 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship for Women|2010]] * '''[[FIBA Europe U-18 Championship for Women]]''' :* '''Winner (3):''' 1998, 2006, 2009 :* Runner-up (6): 1990, 1994, 2004, 2005, 2007, [[2010 FIBA Europe Under-18 Championship for Women|2010]] :* Third place (1): [[2011 FIBA Europe Under-18 Championship for Women|2011]] * '''[[FIBA Europe U-16 Championship for Women]]''' :* '''Winner (7):''' 1999, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2008, 2009, [[2011 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women|2011]] :* Runner-up (2): 1993, 2007
